snippet: A session with American and Iranian delegations in Geneva this week is intended to breathe life into multilateral negotiations over Iran’s nuclear program.
abstract: Senior American officials plan to meet in Geneva with Iranian delegation in attempt to advance stalled nuclear talks.
lead_paragraph: A session with American and Iranian delegations in Geneva this week is intended to breathe life into multilateral negotiations over Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: With Nuclear Talks Sputtering, U.S. and Iran Plan Meeting
headline.print_headline: With Nuclear Talks Sputtering, U.S. and Iran Plan Meeting
